article.name: Elementalism
article.contents: Uses: - Elementalist rituals, such as: - Speak with animals - Commune with nature - Warp wood - Control weather - Tree stride - Rebirth - Reincarnation
article.bodyHtml:
Uses:

  • Elementalist rituals, such as:
    • Speak with animals
    • Commune with nature
    • Warp wood
    • Control weather
    • Tree stride
    • Rebirth
    • Reincarnation
